title: FFXI
description:
Complete FFXI installation.

You will need your own registration codes that can be purchased directly from www.playonline.com.

Instructions on purchasing VALID registration codes from within PlayOnline Viewer are here:
http://boardsus.playstation.com/playstation/board/message?board.id=ffxi&thread.id=237806

   1.  If you haven't used Bittorrent before, you can use a bittorrent client such as BitTorrent or uTorrent.
          * There are five folders which give you the following:
                o FFXI (Main)
                o Zilart
                o CoP
                o ToAU
                o WotG
   2. You must also download the Vista-compatible PlayOnline Viewer here:
          * [url]http://dl.square-enix.co.jp/polus/setup.exe[/url]
   3. After everything is downloaded, you are to install in the following order:
         1. Install PlayOnline Viewer for Vista first THEN update it.
         2. Navigate to FFXI_MAIN and open SETUP.EXE.  This will install the base FFXI files.
         3. Afterwards, go to FFXI_ROZ and open SETUP.EXE.  This will install Zilart expansion pack.
         4. Next, go to FFXI_COP and run SETUP.EXE to install Chains of Promathia.
         5. Lastly, go to FFXI_TOAU and run SETUP.EXE to install Wings of the Goddess.
         6. Start up FFXI and begin updating the game.
   4. Instructions to use Windower can be found here:
          * [url]http://wiki.windower.net/guides/vista_guide[/url]
   5. Enjoy!
